title: Chelsea transfer rumours: Nkunku, Chilwell
title_page: Chelsea transfer rumours: Nkunku, Chilwell - BBC Sport
maintext:
The agent of Chelsea forward Christopher Nkunku has offered the services of the 22-year-old Frenchman to Spanish giants Barcelona. (Sport - in Spanish), external
Chelsea have received no offers for their out-of-favour 28-year-old English left-back Ben Chilwell, who has played just once this season in the Carabao Cup. (Sun), external
